name: Phuket Flying Club
about: Phuket Flying Club, located at Phuket Airpark in Thailand, offers a unique opportunity to learn to fly in a tropical paradise. Our flight school specializes in training students for the Thailand Ultralight Pilot’s License (UPL). The comprehensive training course includes 18 hours of flight training, 3 hours of solo flying, ground school tuition, a written exam, and a practical test with a CAAT examiner. Students must also obtain a Class 4 Medical and complete a background check. With flexible training schedules, students can complete the course in as little as 2 to 3 weeks. Our qualified instructors and modern fleet of aircraft ensure a safe and effective learning environment. The minimum training cost is 117,000 Baht, excluding exam and medical fees. Join us to achieve your flying dreams in a stunning tropical setting.
